description.value: When you use Extraplanar Haze, you can spend 1 additional action to disperse the particles as a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] cloud centered on you instead of as a haze; the activity gains the concentrate trait. All creatures within the cloud become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed], and all creatures outside the cloud become concealed to creatures within it.
